title: Enhance communication workflow using Creatio.ai
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3
On this page
You can use Creatio.ai directly in Microsoft Outlook or Teams using a dedicated add-in. This lets you automate repetitive tasks, retrieve CRM insights, and interact with AI-powered virtual agent assistants to streamline sales operations. Sales and customer-facing professionals can prepare for meetings, access opportunities, and review contact data directly in their collaboration environment.
The Outlook version of the add-in provides a concise summary view for quick preparation, while the Teams version supports full conversational capabilities during live sessions.
Example
A sales representative opens the Creatio.ai add-in in Outlook and sets up a meeting. Before the session, they use Creatio.ai both in Outlook and Teams to prepare for the meeting, review related accounts and opportunities, and identify contacts to which the meeting was forwarded. When the meeting starts, they open the add-in in Teams to capture notes and clarify data. After the meeting they can make a recap of the info—all without leaving Teams or Outlook.
## Access Creatio AI in Microsoft Outlook​
1. Open **Microsoft Outlook** and **go to your calendar**.
2. Select a meeting and **open the detailed view**.
3. Go to the **Apps** section → **Creatio.ai**. This opens the add-in as a compact side panel. You can open the add-in from the **email window** in a similar way as well.
4. **Review the contextual summary** prepared by Creatio.ai. The add-in displays key meeting data: participants, related accounts, and opportunity insights.
5. Click **Join with Creatio.ai** to **continue the same AI-assisted conversation** in Microsoft Teams during the live meeting.
## Access Creatio.ai in Microsoft Teams​
1. Open **Microsoft Teams** and **go to** the **Calendar** tab.
2. Select a scheduled meeting and **open its detailed view**.
3. **Click the Creatio.ai tab** or select **Chat** → **Creatio.ai**. The add-in opens as a dedicated tab within the meeting view.
4. Click **Prepare for the sales meeting** to **start a contextual session**. Creatio.ai retrieves relevant emails and CRM data related to the meeting participants. The system identifies the related **accounts** , **contacts** , and **opportunities** from Creatio.
5. **Review the summarized meeting context** that includes the following:
* customer details and related opportunities
* key stakeholders and current deal stages
* product interests and AI-generated recommendations
6. Use the **chat panel** to **ask follow-up questions** or **generate a custom meeting agenda**.
7. Open the **Creatio.ai** side panel during the meeting from the meeting window to **continue the conversation** , **take notes** , or **verify CRM data in real time**.
8. Reopen the same chat thread after the meeting to **review the AI-generated summary** or **add post-meeting notes**.
The Creatio.ai conversation remains linked to the specific meeting event. When you switch to another meeting, a new conversation starts automatically, preserving the context of each event.
## Use AI Skills in Creatio.ai add-in​
Creatio.ai add-in comes with a set of pre-configured AI Skills that let you get started with intelligent automation right away. View the comprehensive list of out-of-the-box AI Skills available in Creatio.ai chat panel in the task pane and explanations on how you can benefit from them in the table below.
Name| Description| Benefits and use cases| Emails in Outlook| Meetings in Outlook and Teams  
---|---|---|---|---  
Identify contacts| Detect existing contacts based on email participants and show recent history. Suggest creating new contacts if none are found.| Streamlines contact acquisition and profile enrichment. Reduces manual input and improves CRM data quality.| +| +  
Summarize email| Generate a summary of the full email thread.| Saves time and accelerates decision-making by providing quick insight into long email threads.| +| -  
Reply to email| Draft a context-aware email response using the thread and Creatio data.| Improves response time and consistency. Boosts customer loyalty and agent performance.| +| -  
Check open cases| Search for open cases related to the current email and highlight if any are overdue.| Helps reduce missed follow-ups and improve resolution time and CSAT.| +| +  
New meeting| Find a slot for the meeting with the needed people.| Automates meeting scheduling, improves coordination, and saves time.| +| +  
Prepare for the sales meeting| Generate personalized recommendations to prepare for a client meeting at the Opportunity stage.| Enables sales executives to prepare quickly and efficiently.| -| +  
**Creatio.ai** add-in capabilities are not limited to AI Skills accessible via buttons of the Creatio.ai chat panel. You can run any active AI Skill granted by access rights. No-code developers that have access to the "Can manage configuration elements" (CanManageSolution) system operation can customize AI Skills based on your business needs. Learn more: [Develop Creatio.ai Skill](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2535), [AI Skill development recommendations](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2536), [Development specifics for AI Skills in the Creatio.ai Outlook add-in](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2600).
* * *
